title: Deadfall.Adventures.Repack-R.G.Catalyst
description:
Deadfall.Adventures.Repack-R.G.Catalyst

Year: 2013 
Genre: Action (shooter), 3D, 1st person 
Developer: The Farm 51 
Publisher: Nordic Games Publishing 
Publication Type: RePack 
Language:  RUS, ENG 
Sound language:  ENG 
Tablet: enclosing (RELOADED)

Description: Deadfall Adventures - Adventure FPS, which is set in 1938. 
Players will play the role of the traveler James Lee Quatermain accompanying 
U.S. agent, Jennifer Goodwin, in the Egyptian temple in search of an ancient 
artifact "Heart of Atlantis". But it is not just the Americans had their eye 
on the artifact - the German occultists of Ahnenerbe also want to get it. 
Persecuted by the Nazis, James will visit different parts of the world, 
from the deserts of Egypt and the icy Arctic to the jungles of Guatemala.

Features RePack

Nothing is converted / removed all other localization 
Installation time ~ 10 min. 
Author Repack'a: 
RG Catalyst

Memory: 2 GB 
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT / ATI Radeon HD 3830 256 MB VRAM, Shader Model 3 support
